### runOpWithExpandOnOverflow() {#a260fae637de414fe27ae28483df4f379}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>APInt runOpWithExpandOnOverflow (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp; A, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp; B, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;, bool &amp;Overflow)&gt; Op)</>}>
Bring a and b to have the same width and then call <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonbittracker-cpp/#a0ee73ba17c3a2cb54752905e99d77357">op(a, b, overflow)</a>.

<hr/>
 

<Link id="details" />


## Arithmetic operators



If the overflow bit becomes set, resize a and b to double the width and call <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonbittracker-cpp/#a0ee73ba17c3a2cb54752905e99d77357">op(a, b, overflow)</a>, returning its result. The operation with double widths should not also overflow.

Definition at line <a href="#l00159">159</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/slowdynamicapint-cpp">SlowDynamicAPInt.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a> &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>) / <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/detail/#a77acb98b86953c95e4bc46b380e89b09">gcd</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This operation cannot overflow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/slowdynamicapint/#a080fd4d5bc1f48ec40237895f64b6342"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/slowdynamicapint/#a7ccd6b8cee73c66735677d1044f3121f">SlowDynamicAPInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/slowdynamicapint/#a080fd4d5bc1f48ec40237895f64b6342">SlowDynamicAPInt::operator%</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/slowdynamicapint/#a7ccd6b8cee73c66735677d1044f3121f">SlowDynamicAPInt</a> &amp;O)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Width = std::max(Val.getBitWidth(), O.Val.getBitWidth());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/slowdynamicapint/#a0504bdcb9069cb7e2673d8a07af986de">SlowDynamicAPInt</a>(Val.sext(Width).srem(O.Val.sext(Width)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/slowdynamicapint/#a70ea8ef61eafc6ee1009f01753c619ae"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/slowdynamicapint/#a7ccd6b8cee73c66735677d1044f3121f">SlowDynamicAPInt</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/slowdynamicapint/#a70ea8ef61eafc6ee1009f01753c619ae">SlowDynamicAPInt::operator-</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Val.isMinSignedValue()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Overflow only occurs when the value is the minimum possible value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> Ret = Val.sext(2 &#42; Val.getBitWidth());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/slowdynamicapint/#a0504bdcb9069cb7e2673d8a07af986de">SlowDynamicAPInt</a>(-Ret);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/slowdynamicapint/#a0504bdcb9069cb7e2673d8a07af986de">SlowDynamicAPInt</a>(-Val);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ---------------------------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
